sentences.en: a modern building with no superfluous decoration
sentences.cn: 一栋没有多余装饰的现代建筑

sentences.en: At first glance the question might appear to be superfluous.
sentences.cn: 乍一看,这个问题显得很多余.

sentences.en: He had already been told, so our comments were superfluous.
sentences.cn: 早就有人同他说过, 所以我们的意见是多余的.

sentences.en: In writing telegrams omit superfluous words.
sentences.cn: 写电报稿要省去不必要的文字。
写电报稿要省去不必要的文字.

sentences.en: It was eminently superfluous to him to be told that he was reaping the consequences.
sentences.cn: 说他自食其果,更是火上加油.

sentences.en: It would be superfluous to dwell on the matter any more.
Mr. Smith is so famous that any introduction would be superfluous.
sentences.cn: 史密斯先生名气很大,任何介绍都是多余的.

sentences.en: Repack all the superfluous cups in the box.
sentences.cn: 把多馀的杯子都重新装入箱中.

sentences.en: She fined away superfluous matter in the design.
sentences.cn: 她删去了这图案中多余的东西.

sentences.en: She gave him a look that made words superfluous.
sentences.cn: 她看了他一眼，这已表明一切，无须多言了。

sentences.en: That request seemed superfluous when I wrote it.
sentences.cn: 我这样写的时候觉得这个请求似乎是多此一举.

sentences.en: The crowd was so well - behaved that the police presence was superfluous.
sentences.cn: 群众秩序良好,警方在场并无必要.

sentences.en: The introductory style seemed a little superfluous.
sentences.cn: 这种客套未免有点儿多余.

sentences.en: The superfluous words in the article should be stroked out.
sentences.cn: 那篇文章里的多余词语应该删掉.

sentences.en: They are all superfluous and artificial.
sentences.cn: 他们全都是浅薄和做作的.

trans.tran_cn: 过多的，多余的，不必要的，奢侈的
trans.tran_en: more than is needed or wanted
